title: Ticket #4808: Add bogus 'LongHoldReason' attribute to condor_q -l?
description: TimC suggests that it might be a worthwhile usability improvement to insert a bogus attribute, perhaps 'LongHoldReason', into the output of 'condor_q -l', so people used to doing that will be able to see the less-awful hold message(s) (from the VM universe).
creator: tlmiller
